short_name.title: App Name
short_name.description: The short name of the app, to be used on icons. Defaults to name.

icon.title: Icon URL
icon.description: The URL of the app's icon. Can be relative to the app's URL.

version.title: Version
version.description: The semver-compliant version of the app.

homepage.title: Homepage URL
homepage.description: The absolute URL of the app's homepage (e.g. for documentation).

repository.title: Source repository URL
repository.description: The absolute URL of the app's source code repository.

bugs.title: Bugs tracker URL
bugs.description: The absolute URL of the app's issue tracker.

license.description: The SPDX-compliant license ID for the app.

new.title: New Format
new.description: The ID of the default file format for new files. Provide this to enable File > New.

open.title: Open Formats
open.description: The file formats that the app can open. Provide this to enable File > Open.

save.title: Save Formats
save.description: The file formats that the app can save. Provide this to enable File > Save.

name.title: File Format Name
name.description: The name for this file format which will be displayed in dialogs and used for new file names.

type.title: Content Type
type.description: The MIME type which will be used when saving files.

extension.title: File Extension
extension.description: The extension (without the leading dot) that will be used when saving files.

accept.title: Accept String
accept.description: The accept string (as in a HTML file input) that will be used for filtering files in open file dialogs.
